LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Shiv.tools.0.label: руків'я
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Shiv.tools.1.label: вістря
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Knife.label: knife
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Knife.description: One of humankind's oldest tools, the knife is both an everyday tool and a deadly weapon.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Knife.tools.0.label: руків'я
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Knife.tools.1.label: лезо
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Knife.tools.2.label: вістря
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Club.label: палиця
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Club.description: The oldest human weapon - a shaped stick, heavy at one end, for bashing enemies to death. Primitive but effective.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Club.tools.0.label: руків'я
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Club.tools.1.label: голова
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Mace.label: булава
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Mace.description: Вишукана булава, створена для ефективного розмаху та смертоносного удару.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Mace.tools.0.label: руків'я
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Mace.tools.1.label: навершя
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Gladius.label: гладіус
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Gladius.description: A short sword of ancient design. Good for stabbing or slashing.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Gladius.tools.0.label: руків'я
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Gladius.tools.1.label: вістря
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Gladius.tools.2.label: лезо
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Ikwa.label: іква
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Ikwa.description: A short spearhandle attached to a long bladed head, designed to be driven into vital organs with a quick thrust.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Ikwa.tools.0.label: руків'я
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Ikwa.tools.1.label: голова
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Ikwa.tools.2.label: лезо
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Spear.label: спис
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Spear.description: A polearm tipped with a sharp point for stabbing opponents in melee combat.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Spear.tools.0.label: вал
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Spear.tools.1.label: вістря
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_LongSword.label: довгий меч
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_LongSword.description: The ancient weapon of kings, the longsword can be used for slashing or stabbing and is deadly in the right hands.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_LongSword.tools.0.label: руків'я
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_LongSword.tools.1.label: вістря
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_LongSword.tools.2.label: лезо
